column1: * 1913 - Voice actor Francis de Wolff is born.
* 1937 - At the request of Stanley Unwin
column2: young Rayner Unwin writes a book report on Farmer Giles of Ham.

column1: * 1948 - Voice actor Jarion Monroe is born.
* 1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Roger Shaw.
* 1970 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Michael George Tolkien (7 January 1970).
